PSXApplication.name: rx_pubContentLists
PSXApplication.description: This application provides content lists used on the publisher.

PSXDataSet.name: contentlist_article
PSXDataSet.description: Provides a specialice content list for articles going to the filesystem.

PSXDataSelector.nativeStatement: SELECT CONTENTSTATUS.TITLE,CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID, PSX_TEMPLATE.ASSEMBLYURL, CONTENTSTATUS.CURRENTREVISION, CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTPATHNAME,CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTSUFFIX, CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTLASTMODIFIEDDATE, CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTLASTMODIFIER, CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTEXPIRYDATE, CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTTYPEID, CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTSTARTDATE, PSX_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_ID FROM CONTENTSTATUS,PSX_TEMPLATE,STATES,PSX_CONTENTTYPE_TEMPLATE CTT WHERE CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTTYPEID = CTT.CONTENTTYPEID AND PSX_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_ID = CTT.TEMPLATE_ID AND CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTSTATEID = STATES.STATEID AND CONTENTSTATUS.WORKFLOWAPPID = STATES.WORKFLOWAPPID AND STATES.CONTENTVALID = 'n' AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM RXSITEITEMS WHERE CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID = RXSITEITEMS.CONTENTID AND PSX_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_ID = RXSITEITEMS.VARIANTID AND 'publish' = RXSITEITEMS.PUBOPERATION AND :"PSXParam/sys_siteid" = RXSITEITEMS.SITEID AND :"PSXParam/sys_context" = RXSITEITEMS.CONTEXT ) ORDER BY CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID

SELECT CONTENTSTATUS.TITLE,CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID, PSX_TEMPLATE.ASSEMBLYURL, CONTENTSTATUS.CURRENTREVISION, CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTPATHNAME,CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTSUFFIX, CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTLASTMODIFIEDDATE, CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTLASTMODIFIER, CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTEXPIRYDATE, CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTTYPEID, CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTSTARTDATE FROM CONTENTSTATUS,PSX_TEMPLATE,STATES,PSX_CONTENTTYPE_TEMPLATE CTT WHERE CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTTYPEID = CTT.CONTENTTYPEID AND PSX_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_ID = CTT.TEMPLATE_ID AND CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTSTATEID = STATES.STATEID AND CONTENTSTATUS.WORKFLOWAPPID = STATES.WORKFLOWAPPID AND STATES.CONTENTVALID = 'y' AND CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTSTARTDATE < ':"PSXParam/currenttime"' AND PSX_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_ID = :"PSXParam/sys_variantid" AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT CONTENTID FROM RXSITEITEMS WHERE RXSITEITEMS.CONTENTID = CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID AND RXSITEITEMS.SITEID = :"PSXParam/sys_siteid" AND RXSITEITEMS.PUBOPERATION = 'publish' AND RXSITEITEMS.PUBSTATUS = 'success' AND RXSITEITEMS.VARIANTID = PSX_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_ID AND RXSITEITEMS.CONTEXT = :"PSXParam/sys_context" AND RXSITEITEMS.PUBDATE > CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTLASTMODIFIEDDATE ) ORDER BY CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID

PSXDataSet.name: contentlist_generic
PSXDataSet.description: Provides a generic content list going to the filesystem.
